titles: Virgils Eclogues translated into English: by W.L. Gent
author: Virgil.
Lathum, William.
Vives, Juan Luis, 1492-1540.
publisher: Printed by William Iones, dwelling in Red-crosse-street,
notes: W.L. = William Lathum. Translation wrongly attributed to William Lisle.
With a translation of the commentary of Juan Luis Vives.
With a final leaf of verses.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
